tool.name: MetaboliteSpectralMatcher
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && mkdir database && ln -s '$database' 'database/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $database.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($database.ext)' && mkdir out &&
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && export PYTHONPATH='$__tool_directory__/CTDopts/' && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' -database 'database/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $database.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($database.ext)' -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("mztab")}'
## Postprocessing && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("mztab")}' '$out' #if $adv_opts_cond.adv_opts_selector=='advanced' and $adv_opts_cond.ctd_out_FLAG && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.name: prec_mass_error_value
param.label: Error allowed for precursor ion mass

param.name: mass_error_unit
param.label: Unit of mass error (ppm or Da)

param.name: report_mode
param.label: Which results shall be reported: the top-three scoring ones or the best scoring one?

param.name: test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Perform a spectral library search.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/documentation/UTILS_MetaboliteSpectralMatcher.html
